mdRecord.dcterms:title: Whereas the State-Convention in their fifth resolve recommended to the inhabitants of the several towns to keep a watchful eye over each other, that no evasion or infringement of their resolutions may escape notice ... : Resolved, That we the inhabitants of this town do hereby engage to watch carefully over each other, and persons with whom we have any dealings .. /By order of the Select-Men, &c. Danvers, August 26, 1779. ; Archelaus Dale, Chairman, Pro. Temp.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dale, Archelaus.
Russell, Ezekiel, 1743-1796
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed by E. Russell, at his Printing-Office, near the Bell-Tavern
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: American loyalists
